web_snippets: Chaya Gilboa was a faculty member of the Shalom Hartman Institute of North America, and the Director of Jewish Engagement at Leichtag Foundation.
Chaya Gilboa is a storm, hovering above us, shaking us to our core, yet deeply rooted within us. She is the closest thing I can imagine to a modern prophetess.”.
Chaya Gilboa is a Talmud teacher, an activist, a flaming redhead, and was – for the last three years – the CEO of the Jerusalem Philanthropic Initiatives.
